How effectively hydrotherapy affect secondary outcome measure quality life , pain experience , mood , blood pressure ? 4 . Are clinical effect hydrotherapy comparable conventional physiotherapy affect joint ? 6 . This study design prospective randomise control clinical trial three arm , carried German clinic specialise integrative medicine , investigate clinical effect hydrotherapy osteoarthritis knee hip , compare conventional physiotherapy . To achieve maximum scientific accuracy respect randomisation , random distribution , avoidance selection bias , etc. , independent Department General Medicine Primary Care University Leipzig Medical School function external evaluation test centre . One hundred eighty patient diagnose osteoarthritis hip knee randomly assign one three intervention group : hydrotherapy , physiotherapy , physiotherapy hydrotherapy affect joint . In first group , patient receive Kneipp hydrotherapy daily , water apply form alternate cold warm thigh affusion ( alternate cold warm water stimulation particularly relevant knee hip region ) . Patients second group receive physiotherapy hip knee joint three time week .
